cast.overview: Ash, a handsome, shotgun-toting, chainsaw-armed department store clerk, is time warped backwards into England's Dark Ages, where he romances a beauty and faces legions of the undead.
cast.title: Army of Darkness

details.biography: Shiva Gordon was born on November 12, 1973 in Tehran, Iran as Shiva Bagheri. She is an actress, known for Army of Darkness (1992), Doogie Howser, M.D. (1989) and A Brand New Life (1989). Dance Instructor & Choroegrapher - teaches at her own school (Shiva's Dance & Fitness) as well as working for Michelle Harden at Desert Stars.
details.name: Shiva Gordon
